me.mnafees

Class GameModel

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.util.Observable
      • me.mnafees.GameModel

  • class GameModel
extends java.util.Observable
    The main model class for the game responsible for all the logic while the game is being played.

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      (package private) static class  GameModel.State
      Container enum for the current state of the game

      • collidedWithBrick

        private boolean collidedWithBrick()
        Returns a boolean indicating whether the ball collided with a brick or not. Also increses the paddle size in case of a power up and decrements the level of the brick when applicable.
        Returns:
        true if the ball collided with a brick, false otherwise

      • collidedWithPaddle

        private boolean collidedWithPaddle()
        Returns:
        true if the ball collided with the paddle, false otherwise

      • stopBallMovement

        void stopBallMovement()
        Stops the ball movement meaning the game has finished.

        Returns:
        the current in-game bounds of the ball

        Parameters:
        state - the desired stated of the game
